title: Smart Data Models - ExcPIC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Proportional/Integral Regulator Excitation System Model.  This model can be used to represent excitation systems with a proportional-integral (PI) voltage regulator controller.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcPIC

e1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage value 1 (E1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

e2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage value 2 (E2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

efdmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter maximum limit (Efdmax).  Typical Value = 8. Default: 0.0

efdmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter minimum limit (Efdmin).  Typical Value = -0.87. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI controller gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 3.15. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter regulation factor (Kc).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant (Ke).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rate feedback gain (Kf).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Current source gain (Ki).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential source gain (Kp).  Typical Value = 6.5. Default: 0.0

se1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Saturation factor at E1 (Se1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

se2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Saturation factor at E2 (Se2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ta1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI controller time constant (Ta1).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

ta2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Ta2).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

ta3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead time constant (Ta3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

ta4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lag time constant (Ta4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant (Te).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tf1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rate feedback time constant (Tf1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tf2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rate feedback lag time constant (Tf2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

vr1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI maximum limit (Vr1).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vr2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI minimum limit (Vr2).  Typical Value = -0.87. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator maximum limit (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator minimum limit (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -0.87. Default: 0.0
